name: Sarah Jenkins
longBio: I am a digital artist based in Portland, OR. My work focuses on surreal landscapes and character design. Owning my token gives you access to exclusive WIPs, high-res downloads, and voting rights on my next series.

name: Davide Rossi
shortBio: Indie electronic producer. Building the future of sound.
longBio: Creating sonic landscapes that transport you. Join my community to help curate my next album, get backstage access, and royalties from future streams (mock).

name: Tech Explained
shortBio: Demystifying complex tech topics for everyone.
longBio: We break down the latest in AI, crypto, and gadgetry. Token holders get early access to videos and can propose topics for deep dives.

name: Maya Singh
shortBio: Plant-based recipes for the modern soul.
longBio: Cooking should be easy, healthy, and delicious. Support my journey to write my first cookbook and open a pop-up restaurant.

name: GameZone Pro
shortBio: Top tier esports commentary and analysis.
longBio: Deep dives into the meta of your favorite competitive games. Token holders enter exclusive tournaments and coaching sessions.

name: Elena C
longBio: Writing the next great space opera. Join the 'Crew' (token holders) to name characters, ships, and influence the plot.

name: FitLife with Marcus
longBio: Fitness is more than just lifting weights. It's about mindset. Join my challenge and get exclusive workout plans.

name: Crypto Daily
shortBio: Daily crypto market analysis and news.
longBio: Staying ahead of the curve in Web3. Token holders get acts as a subscription to my premium newsletter and alpha group.

name: Logan
longBio: Csm is peak. God forbid a white boy catch a vibe. Join the spidey squad.
